item.description:
Noble Japanese Hibachi has some good specials during the weekdays. I just called to confirm this. If you're into sushi, it's 40% off sushi night. Along with that its a great place overall. So come through and have some fun with others, have a drink or saki as the chef slices and dices our food then does the flaming onion volcano "choo choo" train thing. (you all know what i mean, lol)

For those coming from Southern CT area. I'll provide car pooling from Exit 15 on I91 (Wallingford). Noble is inside the Walmart Plaza in Southington on Queen Street.

 

See you there,

Christian
item.how_to_find_us: You can call or text me at 860 357 7264 or maybe if you ask the hostess inside she should direct you to us.
item.why: It's the middle of the work week. We love to eat, and have fun... So let's kick back and get our "Ching Chong Choong" grub on!
item.name: Hibachi Night...
